TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet Points[COLOR_REVERT] per turn in the capital when stationed in a foreign city
TEXT.Chinese: 当驻扎在外国城市时首都每回合[ICON_BULLET]+1[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家点[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Build the Gate of Sun and settle a Great Prophet in your capital by 900 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元900年前建成太阳之门并在首都入驻一位大预言家

TEXT.English: Have two cities with refined culture by 1000 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1000年前拥有2座城市with refined culture
蒂瓦纳库-马库胡尤斯图斯

TEXT.English: It is the year 110 AD. As the invention of ceramics strengthens existing trade routes, the pilgrimige site of Tiwanaku begins growing into a true city and the first great regional power since the fall of the Norte Chican Civilization. With an economy built on the seasonal swelling of visitors from far and wide, the city of Tiwanaku is primed to grow into an empire of great fame and glory.
TEXT.Chinese: 现在是公元110年。随着陶瓷的发明加强了现有的贸易路线，蒂瓦纳库朝圣地开始成长为一个真正的城市和自北契卡文明衰落以来第一个强大的地区力量。随着来自四面八方的游客的季节性增长，蒂瓦纳库市的经济将发展成为一个享有盛名和荣耀的帝国。

TEXT.English: Experiece two golden ages by 1100 AD
TEXT.Chinese: 公元1100年前经历2次黄金时代

TEXT.English: It is the year 600 AD. The Tiwanaku Empire is in the middle of a cold war with their northern neighbors...
TEXT.Chinese: 现在是公元600年。提瓦纳库帝国正处于与北方邻国的冷战中。。。

TEXT.English: Extra Production in the Capital. +1 Priest Slot from Pagan Temples.
TEXT.Chinese: 首都提供额外产能；原始神庙+1神学家槽
